source.name: Unearthed Arcana: Races of Eberron
source.author: Wizards of the Coast
source.description: Races from the world of Eberron return to Unearthed Arcana this month, with the kalashtar joining revised versions of the changeling, shifter, and warforged. For more information about that world, see Wayfinder's Guide to Eberron, available on the Dungeon Masters Guild (dmsguild.com).
